Definition: Area of land devoted to growing crops for consumption, export, and industrial use. Does not include pastures.
Area of land covered in primary forest (e.g., old growth)
Area of land covered in secondary forest, including plantations
Area of unmanaged grasslands, excluding pastures.
Other land use categories not included elsewhere; can include deserts, glacial and permanent snow cover, etc.
Area of land devoted to urban/suburban development. Assume no emissions from land use (primary emissions captured elsewhere).
Managed and unmanaged flooded lands, including reservoirs, lakes, rivers, and similar areas with permanent inundation.
Lands with biomass sequestration, but excluding forest and grasslands. Land use classes here might include chaparral, savannah, sparse woodlands, and others.
Lands used for managed grazing. Can include grassland pastures and
